name: Mobirise Free Mobile Website Builder
short_description:
MobiRise Website Builder creates responsive, retina and mobile friendly websites in a few clicks. Easy and fast.

 Drag and drop website builder Make your own website in a few clicks! Mobirise helps you cut down development time by providing you with a flexible website editor with a drag and drop interface.
 Live preview See the result instantly without a need to save or export!
 Modern styles Mobirise has provided for website developers a growing library of modern blocks which can be used either partially or in full for every website developed through the builder.
 Bootstrap 3 Bootstrap 3 has been noted as one of the most reliable and proven frameworks and Mobirise has been equipped to develop websites using this framework.
Responsive One of Bootstrap 3’s big points is responsiveness and Mobirise makes effective use of this by generating highly responsive website for you.
summary: Create awesome mobile-first websites - No coding!
